document_data.name: Calaethe Hallowthorn
document_data.mainbody: '''Calaethe Hallowthorn''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: On {{yearlink|1373}}, the [[Waterdhavian]] [[thief]] [[Narnra Shalace]]'s first assignment as a spy for [[Caladnei]], the [[Royal Magician of Cormyr]], was to tail a number of that country's [[War Wizards]] including Calaethe Hallowthorn.{{cite book/Elminster's Daughter/MMP|313|18}}
